charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Penny hiding
behind a building.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1101_0200:
She seemed to be intently staring at a Trainer with
an Eevee, so [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided
to call out to her...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_0500:
Umm... Could you stop looking at me without
saying anything...?
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_0700:
I saw that Veevee—um, I mean Eevee— and I
was curious...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_0800:
So I was hiding and observing them so the
Trainer wouldn’t notice me...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0301_0900: You should have talked to them.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0401_1000:
Going up to someone I don’t know is way too
difficult, but...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_1400:
My dorm room in Paldea is full of Veevees
and Pokémon figurines. It’s a space of comfort
for me...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_1500:
Being surrounded by my Veevees is my kinda
heaven!
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_1600: Veevees are so friendly and super cute!
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_1700:
They understand how I’m feeling and snuggle
up to me!
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0301_1800: They do make me feel better.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0401_2000:
The infinite power of Veevees to heal people’s
hearts!
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0402_2300:
I’d be happy if you liked Veevees as much
as I do...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_2500:
Veevees are very cute, but contrary to their looks,
they have a dangerous side to them.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_2600:
Take my current partner Pokémon Sylveon, for
example.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_2700:
When she’s going after her prey, she sometimes
uses her ribbon-like feelers to distract them
and strike...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_2800: My home is back in Galar, and...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_2900:
apparently, there’s a fairy tale that describes a
Sylveon vanquishing a dragon Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_3000: That contrast is also one of the charms of Veevees.
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_3100: I’ve been talking too much. My throat hurts...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_3300: U-um... If you don’t mind me asking...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0401_3700:
I kind of expected that. I’m so glad I just went for
it and asked...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0302_3800: I really REALLY love all Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_0402_3900: O-oh... That came out of nowhere...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_4000:
Hey... There’s a place me and Sylveon have being
going to since we came to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_4100:
It’s a secret place where Eevee fans gather. Would
you like to go with me next time?
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_4200:
I hope you can use this opportunity,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0293_00_button/2301_1201_4300: to become as big an Eevee fan as I am!
